item.description:
Here's the info for our Christmas Party. This will be our third year having it at Slattery's.
Festivities start at 6:00 with a cash bar and hor d'oeuvres.
Dinner at 7:00. Includes both entrees Roast Prime Rib and Baked Atlantic Haddock. Along with all the fixins. Dessert and coffees also included..

This is a night to bring along and introduce your significant other to all of the characters they've been hearing about! Yes, we are for real.

Join us for a fun night out with your local flying friends and with (hopefully) a slide show of the year, raffle drawings and a surprise or two.

Tickets will be on sale at the November's pilots meeting. Or by e-mailing Charley Valera, Jim Bisson or Russ (Toby) Hume.

So, whether you e-mail, call us or send light signal's, make sure you get your clearance (tickets). We can hold them at the Will Call window with prior payment.

Let's have a Merry Christmas and add to your list lower avfuel costs!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA EAA Christmas Party
